attributes.action: to amend existing Food Labelling Regulations to incorporate a legal requirement for the labelling of all alchoholic drinks to include details of calorific content per bottle/half bottle/glass in addition to the number of units shown in the same way.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is difficult to determine exactly how many units of alcohol are in a bottle of wine for example.  By amending the labelling to show per glass/half bottle/full bottle it might be easier to establish proximity to maximum units prior to consumption.  Additionally, if calorific intake were also shown in this way it is likely to reduce/prevent excessive consumption.
